relative 	Meleagros Ptolemaios,	Demonike,	Terpnos Ptolemaios,	end
relative 	Agathokles Thraikikos,	Lysandra Ptolemaios,	Alexandros Thraikikos,	Leontiskos Thraikikos,	Kleopatra,	end
relative 	Philadelphos Ptolemaios,	Arsinoe,	Euergetes Ptolemaios,	Lysimachos Ptolemaios,	Berenike,	end
relative 	Menelaos Salaminios,	Philotera Kypriakos,	Artakama,	Ptolemais,	end


; ---------------------------------------------------------
; #########    romans_julii - Arche Seleukideia   #########
; ---------------------------------------------------------

faction	romans_julii, balanced stalin
denari 3000
